mercury.name: Mercury
mercury.tagline: Smallest and closest to the Sun
mercury.description: A rocky, cratered world with extreme temperature swings.

venus.name: Venus
venus.description: Thick clouds and a runaway greenhouse effect make it the hottest planet.

earth.name: Earth
earth.description: The only known planet with liquid water on the surface and life.

mars.name: Mars
mars.description: Dusty deserts, polar ice caps, and the largest volcano in the solar system.

jupiter.name: Jupiter
jupiter.description: A gas giant with powerful storms like the Great Red Spot.

saturn.name: Saturn
saturn.description: Known for its spectacular ring system made of ice and rock.

uranus.name: Uranus
uranus.description: Rotates on its side; a cold world with faint rings and many moons.

neptune.name: Neptune
neptune.description: An ice giant with supersonic winds and deep blue clouds.
